title: Said Salam thinking he's Muslim but he's not - Sinful? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner] from Bangladesh assalamu alaikum if a person give the Salam to someone and
later finds out that he was a non-muslim will he be sinful for that because we know that
it's not permissible to say assalamu alaikum to non-muslims the Ayah in Suratul Baqarah
the last Ayah of Suratul Baqarah Allah Says [ __ ] Oh Allah do not hold us accountable if we
were to forget or to make an error when I give salaam to someone thinking that he's
a Muslim and then discover that he's sikh or a Hindu I made a mistake I cannot retract
this but this mistake was an honest mistake because I thought he was a Muslim therefore
there is no sin none whatsoever on you for this and Allah Knows Best and have you ever taken a counseling session
with me go to my website and you will find counseling sessions and apply for one if you
can afford it that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled for one free session and this
is for everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot afford it because they're
poor I'll give them one free session without a problem a full half an hour so come to me
and let's speak about it inshallah within the following two days or three days I will
uh try and seek Allah's guidance to solve the problem once and for All
